body.name: JOILCAN Mini Tripod for Camera, 25-inch Aluminum Tabletop Camera Tripod, Portable Travel Tripod with Remote and Tablet/Phone Holder, Phone Tripod for DSLR Cameras, Projectors, Spotting Scopes
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 11 hrs 16 mins
features: 【Versatile Shooting Angles】Phone camera tripod is equipped with a stable and smooth 3-way pan head, giving you a flexible shooting experience. Compact tripod for camera supports horizontal, vertical, overhead and 360° panoramic shooting, achieving multi-angle shooting and capturing moments with ease.

【Aluminum Mini Tripod】Mini camera tripod is made of high-quality aluminum alloy, durable and solid. Non-slip feet design to keep the tripod steady to prevent camera shake for long exposures, and weight hook design for increased stability. Maximum load weight is 6.5 pounds.

【Adjustable Travel Tripod】Upgraded quick flip locks tripod adjusted freely from 12" to 25" in a few seconds to meet different height requirements for variety of shooting environments and photography needs. Mini tripod folds down to only 11.8 inches, weighs 1.3 lbs. Lightweight and easy to carry when traveling.

【Wide Compatibility】Standard 1/4" screw mount compatible with all cameras (Nikon D3500, Fujifilm X-T200, Canon EOS 250D, Olympus, Panasonic), DSLR, digital cameras, Laser Level, projector, ring light. 2-in-1 Phone Tablet Holder Tripod for iPhone 15 14 13 13 12 11/11 Pro/Pro Max/XS/XR/X/8/8 Plus/ Galaxy Note 20/10/9/S23/S22/S20/S10, iPad Pro 9.7"/10.5"/11", iPad Mini 1/2/3/4/5/6, iPad Air.

【What You Will Get】The package includes a Tripod*1, Extra Quick Release Plate*1, Tablet/Phone Holder*1, Remote*1, Carrying Bag*1, and User Manual*1. We provide email reply service within 24 hours and provide a two-year quality guarantee for tripods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very portable! Better than expected and worth it!
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is portable and offers good versatility on desks, on counters, and on other platforms and surfaces.It is very practical and easy to use!The compact size allows you to hold it comfortably with one hand while using your device, and the legs are both extendable and adjustable enough for varying heights as displayed in the pictures.It has overall a very easy to use position shifting.The mounting plate is smooth to remove, and it has a surprisingly useful bubble-balance level check ( in the green cap on the knob). The swivel-ball is fit in place and can be angled all around the base, or adjusted to a 45 degree angle. The ball-pan lock knob and base are also very comfortable to use.In addition, the tripod is very stable.Each leg is reinforced by a robust rubber cap surrounding each foot. The legs can be extended securely (see max. height in pictures) , with each leg having its own angle adjustment lock.They also allow for an easy grip when fully closed together, making it easy to carry around.The center column (in the middle of the tripod's legs) is also adjustable for varying heights with its own lock knob, and it can be removed to further lower the tripod.I never expected how useful a smaller tripod would be until recently.This is incredibly helpful, portable, and easy to use. Highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, sturdy, versatile mini-tripod
reviews.reviewText: I like to travel, and now that Covid vaccinations look like opening the world up again, I'm always on the lookout for well made photographic products that are light, easy to pack, and get the job done. This tripod is well made, and extremely versatile, fitting the needs of those who need a tripod for their phone, compact camera, or even in the right circumstances, a DSLR or full frame camera with a standard, or light zoom attached. It comes well packaged, and is made of carefully milled aluminum and quality plastics. It has a ball head, is fully adjustable, and weighs in at about a pound and a half. It extends to a total height of more than 20 inches. It's sturdy enough for light use. You wouldn't use long telephoto lenses on it, even though it's rated for 15 pounds, but I'd have no problem attaching a DSLR with a kit lens, and for what it's designed to do, it works very well. It comes with an attachment to use a phone, and it holds my Pixel 3A securely. Great for Zoom, or for stable video shots. As you can see from the pictures, the central element is removable for use as a hand held vlogging tool. Great small tripod. Glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy for its size
reviews.reviewText: This is very sturdy for its size. I have several different tripods, but I want one small this fit the bill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This small desktop tripod is surprisingly sturdy. It has more weight to it then you would think. It easily holds a S21 Ultra phone in the landscape or portrait orientation. It comes with the cell phone holder. It also can easily hold a GoPro camera. I had no concerns about its stability with these items. I also tried by Canon T5i DSLR on it. I had a big lens and it started to tip forward so watch for that but it had no problem with the weight. A DSLR with a small lens would work. I think the description said it would hold 15 pounds which the best I can tell is true. The legs extend out to give it some more height but it folds down pretty small for ease to carry. It even comes with a little carry bag. It has a standard tripod attachment on a ball head. The ball head held everything in place once tightened down but you still get the wide variety of angles. The ends of the legs have rubber tips so it won't mess up a wood desk/table. Overall, definitely worth he money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well built, easy to use, no bubble level unless ball joint is horizontal
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent little tripod. It says desktop but it's applicable elsewhere too. I took it out for some night photography and it's small size was just so much more convenient for carrying especially since I didn't really need to have a full size tripod with me. It's very stable and held up my Sony A7 just as well as it held up my phone. I have the full size tripod with ball head as well and I didn't think I'd use it as much as I do but it's really nifty and I use it quite a bit. I didn't really like the absence of a bubble level to let me know when I'm level when I have the ball joint straight up. There is a bubble level on the dial that is nice, but can only be used when the ball joint is sideways. Also the holder for the phone could've been better if they used a holder that clicks into place because I had to fumble with getting the holder open and getting my phone in there. Otherwise, this is an excellent product that will serve as far more a desktop tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and compact tabletop tripod
reviews.reviewText: This is a solidly built compact tripod. It is stable enough to support my full size Canon 7d with battery grip and a large EF 70-300MM L lens attached. The tripod has the same fluid and sturdy ballhead joint and comes with an arca style quick-mount plate. The three legs easily extend from 9 to 17 inches. Notice the overall size is comparable to a 20 oz water bottle - this is an easily packable and portable tripod. Best for use indoors for close up work when the full sized 81-inch tripod would be ridiculously over sized. This tripod also includes a cell phone mount, but it would be overkill for just a cellphone camera. It is perfect for a full size camera when a tabletop is all you need. Wonderful product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stable and sturdy table top tripod
reviews.reviewText: Small but able to hold a mirrorless camera without any problems.Made of aluminum, build quality is solid and feels sturdy.Comes with a carry pouch, a phone holder and an allen wrench if you want to adjust the tripod leg’s tightness.The legs can be adjusted with a twist-lock mechanism and easy to use.It has a ball head that moves smoothly and doesn’t drift when locked in place.Knobs are big and easy to operate.If you want a compact tripod that is sturdy and stable this is the one to get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Vertical Stability
reviews.reviewText: This table tripod is study and convenient for birdwatcher as angles needed to be adjusted often.Easily lock a Celestron Ultima 80m spotting scope in various vertical angles - no drooping.Durability? time will tell....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Auf der Suche nach einem Stativ für die Reise und für Makros bin ich auf dieses kleine Stativ gestoßen und nach zwei Wochen Nutzung begeistert:- solide und robust genug für zB eine Sony A7iii und das nicht ganz kleine 24-105mm Zoom- sehr kleines Packmaß und geringes Gewicht- auch für Langzeitbelichtungen geeignet weil kein Nachschwingen wie zB bei einem Gorillapod- erstaunlich guter Kugelkopf, einmal justiert, egal in welchem Winkel, hält er ohne nachzugeben- einfacher Drehmechanismus an den Beinen zum Ausfahren. Da war ich anfangs skeptisch…aber es funktioniert tipptoppEinzig, dass am Kugelkopf nur eine Schraube für Drehung und Neigung vorhanden ist, könnte man bemängeln. Ein sauberes Panorama ist so nicht möglich. Und die Libelle ist wohl auch zu rein dekorativen Zwecken vorhanden.Der Rest ist für diesen Preis richtig gut, stabil und wertig. Es ist so schnell zur Hand und einfach zu bedienen, dass ich indoor mittlerweile die teuren, großen Stative meist weder nutze noch brauche.Und für den Rucksack ist es genial und benötigt nicht mal eine Stativhalterung. Im Lieferumfang ist eine Arca Platte und eine Handyhalterung inbegriffen. Und das für unter 50€.Klare Empfehlung ✅

Buen tripode relacion calidad/precio. No soy un usuario que le guste cargar con trípodes pesados. Me gusta que todo lo que necesito para fotografiar me quepa en la misma mochila pequeña, así que me ha venido de perlas. Ademas es un puntazo que se pueda poner la cámara colgando bocabajo, ya que me encantan las fotos a nivel del suelo, y puedo acercarla muchísimo a esa linea. Trae soporte para el movil. Sin duda, lo recomiendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: A superb tripod with a twist
reviews.reviewText: This looks and feels sturdy. Well built, and works well in a range of operation. You have to turn the legs to enable the extension, and turn the other way to lock it. My concern is that doing the turning and clicking many times over something will give way, so time will tell.Some thought has gone it so that the various parts work well together as a whole and not cause friction or such, e.g. there is a bit of foam on the legs to prevent the middle pole cutting into it. Again, over time, this might wear out. The screw to clamp or unclamp the camera holder is a far better idea than a twist and clip found in other tripods.The middle pole being made in two parts is ingenious, that you can reassemble it "upside down" which enables the camera to be clamped much lower down. I don't quite like the middle knob that controls the height of the middle pole and the tilt, but I can see this makes some sense that doing two tasks in one is probably a good thing, and also it saves another knob, which saves space.Its weight is not too light nor heavy; too light it will topple easily, too heavy, well it defeats purpose of being small. It comes with a holder for smartphone, as many tripods do. Overall, very impressed with it.

reviews.reviewerName: Cliente Kilvia Martins Cliente Kilvia Martins
reviews.reviewText: A encomenda veio com defeito já fiz a devolução e foi entregue no 31/08 até hoje estou à espera do reembolso 😤
